text: Myurellopsis paucistriata is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Myurellopsis paucistriata (E. A. Smith, 1873). title: Myurellopsis paucistriata
